metadata.name: Hunter of the Sky
metadata.description:
"Hunter of the Sky" is basically based on Noise and GLSL texture operators.

In this artwork, I imagined an eagle, which saw its prey on a both rainy and sunny day. A rainbow appears in the sky as the eagle is flying. The composition reflects a hunting moment in an abstract way.

In this project, firstly, I built the chain of operators, and then the artwork created itself generatively. I worked on the details afterwards.

Made with TouchDesigner
         1920 x 1080
Nehir Ers√º, February 2022
